text: Bari boorhi aurten jinhen nikah ki umeed (aur khuwaish hi) na rahi ho woh apnay agar apnay kapray utar rakhen to unn per koi gunah nahi ba-shart-e-kay woh apna banao singhaar zahir kerney waliyan na hon tahum inn say bhi ehtiyaat rakhen to inn kay liye boht afzal hai aur Allah Taalaa sunta janta hai
